text: Pavlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Krivle-Ilyushkinsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 235 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 28 km from Yermolayevo, 5 km from Krivle-Ilyushkino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Pavlovka, Kuyurgazinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
